hero.heading: Next generation digital banking
hero.subheading: Take your financial life online. Your Easybank account will be a one-stop-shop for spending, saving, budgeting, investing, and much more.

features.heading: Why choose Easybank?
features.subheading: We leverage Open Banking to turn your bank account into your financial hub. Control your finances like never before.

items.heading: Online Banking
items.text: Our modern web and mobile applications allow you to keep track of your finances wherever you are in the world.

items.heading: Simple Budgeting
items.text: See exactly where your money goes each month. Receive notifications when you’re close to hitting your limits.

items.heading: Fast Onboarding
items.text: We don’t do branches. Open your account in minutes online and start taking control of your finances right away.

items.heading: Open API
items.text: Manage your savings, investments, pension, and much more from one account. Tracking your money has never been easier.
